pages.text: Different ores can be found in specific biomes at varying depths below sea level.
Malachite: Found in Swamps, between X1 to X2 blocks below sea level.
Cassiterite: Found in Taiga, between X3 to X4 blocks below sea level.
graphite: Found in Extreme Hills, between X1 to X2 blocks below sea level.
Galena: Found in Swamps, between X5 to X6 blocks below sea level.
Acanthite: Found in Desert, between X7 to X8 blocks below sea level.
Kaolin: Found in Desert, between X9 to X10 blocks below sea level.
Salt: Found in Swamps, between X1 to X2 blocks below sea level.
Amethyst: Found in Swamps, between X1 to X2 blocks below sea level.
